    [SpringBoot/Vue.js Project] Blog Implementation - Spring Boot

    July 12, 2021 3 minute read

    On this page

    • Backend Setting
      • application.properties
    • Config Package
      • MongoConfig Class
      • OracleConfig Class
      • WebConfig Class
    • ApiResponse Package
      • ApiResponse Abstract
    • Main API Packages
      • Item Class
      • Adapter Class
      • Repository Class
      • Controller Class
      • Service Class
      • Response Class
      • Request Class

    Backend Setting

    application.properties

    Config Package

    MongoConfig Class

    : Embedded Database Setting (Mongo DB)

    OracleConfig Class

    : External Database Setting (Oracle ATP DB)

    WebConfig Class

    : Fronted Connection Setting

    ApiResponse Package

    ApiResponse Abstract

    Main API Packages

    Item Class

    : Model of the API, mostly from Oracle ATP Database. (Below is the partial of ArticleItem Class.)

    Adapter Class

    : Based in the @Builder of the Item Class, Adapter Class build the Response and Item(Model).

    Repository Class

    : Below is the Repository from Oracle ATP Database.

    Controller Class

    : URL Resolution for get, getAll, create, delete and update.

    Service Class

    : get, getAll, create, delete and update methods using Repository.

    Response Class

    : This class extends the ApiResponse Abtract from ApiResponse package.

    Request Class

    Tags: Backend, Database, Oracle ATP Database, Oracle Cloud, Spring Boot
